channel.title: [Help] Starter Set
channel.description: Ive done this like 6 months ago and now i forgot. How do i add a starter set? Basic code and where to put it will help. I got the rest. Pls help meh? ;D

item.title: [Help] Starter Set
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

Richscape v4 gives an auto starter, its not dodian.

hold on ill try and find the code for it

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Starter Set
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Declare the character token ‘starter’.
Hint;

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Also; (Hint; Character-tokens.)

else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { starter = Integer.parseInt(token2); }
I don’t spoon feed =].

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Starter Set
item.dc:creator: @I_End_I I_End_I
item.description:
@I_End_I wrote:

Well, i would give you the code to make the starter give the items without the command (as soon as they first start playing, it gives it to them once and only once automatically when they first log in) but it’s dodian and i’m not posotive if it would give errors or not on your source. if you want to try it here it is:

} if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(Item ID, Amount of item); }

Don’t get your hopes up with this, it probobly will give errors or will not work with a non dodian base.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Starter Set
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

well here’s a starter code, but you have to make it save in the character files too…

else if (command.equalsignorecase("starter"))
if (starter = 0) {
starter= 1;
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
sendMessage("You recieve your starter set!");
}
if (starter = 1) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll(+playername "tried to get another starter! What a n33b");
  disconnected = true;
 }

Read full topic
